mapper.insert: INSERT INTO entry_apply_master (aply_no, rcrt_no, course_div, name_kor, name_eng, pic_file_no, birthday, gender, email, zipcode, addr_local, addr_detail, tel_local, hp_local, mem_id) VALUES (#{aplyNo}, #{rcrtNo}, #{courseDiv}, #{nameKor}, #{nameEng}, #{picFileNo}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{addrLocal}, #{addrDetail}, #{telLocal}, #{hpLocal}, #{memId});
INSERT INTO member(mem_id, pw, login_id) VALUES (#{memId}, #{pw}, #{email});
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM entry_apply_master WHERE email = #{email});
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM entry_apply_master WHERE email = #{email} AND rcrt_no = #{rcrtNo});
mapper.update: UPDATE entry_apply_master SET name_kor=#{nameKor}, name_eng=#{nameEng}, pic_file_no=#{picFileNo}, birthday=#{birthday}, gender=#{gender}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, addr_local=#{addrLocal}, addr_detail=#{addrDetail}, tel_local=#{telLocal}, hp_local=#{hpLocal} WHERE aply_no = #{aplyNo};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM entry_apply_acdm WHERE APLY_NO = #{aplyNo} AND RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO entry_apply_acdm VALUE ((SELECT ACDM_SEQ FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ACDM_SEQ)+1, 0) AS ACDM_SEQ FROM entry_apply_acdm) SEQ), #{aplyNo}, #{rcrtNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{gradeDiv}, #{gradeStatusDiv}, #{orgName}, #{deptName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM entry_apply_career WHERE APLY_NO = #{aplyNo} AND RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO entry_apply_career VALUE ((SELECT CAREER_SEQ FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAREER_SEQ)+1, 0) AS CAREER_SEQ FROM entry_apply_career) SEQ), #{aplyNo}, #{rcrtNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{plcName}, #{plcJob}, #{note})
